verses.text: Ix in tanhwejnhej scolwal Jehová, haxo ix ab'ani ayic ix in tewi t'ay.
Ix in yik'k'eta t'a jun olan te ay smay. Ix in scol b'aj sitz'atac. Ix in yak'ank'e t'a yib'anh jun k'een k'een yic tzin tek'b'ej in b'a.
Ix yak' wal jun b'it ak'to t'ayin, b'it yic aloj wach' lolonel t'a ko Diosal. Comonoc sat sk'ol jantac heb' tz'ilan jun tik, yic syak'och Jehová heb' yipoc sk'ool.
Te wach' yic heb' tz'ak'anoch Jehová yipoc sk'ool, max yak'och spensar heb' t'a heb' syik'chaanh sb'a, aton heb' tz'och tzak'an t'a spatic juntzanh comon Dios.

Mamin Jehová in Diosal, manh jantacoc juntzanh tas satub'tac ix a b'o'o yet' jantac a wach'k'olal ix ak' t'ayonh. Malaj junok mach syal slajb'an sb'a ed'oc. In gana swalel masanil a wach'k'olal chi', palta max in tzak'wanlaj, yujto manhxo b'ischajb'enoc.
Max a nib'ejlaj nok' nok' yet' ixim trigo silab'il. Malaj nok' nok' tza k'ana' yic snhusji silab'il t'ayach, ma silab' yic stupcanel ko mul. Palta ix a jac in chiquin yic tzin cha wab' tas tzala'.
Yuj chi' ix wala': Tik tzin ja'i, xin chi. Ha tas tz'ib'ab'ilkan t'a a lolonel, a wab'ixal syala'.
Ach in Diosal, snib'ej in k'ool tzin k'ulej icha a gana. Ayoch a k'ayb'ub'al t'a in pensar.
Mamin Jehová, ix walkanel yab'ixal a tojolal t'a skal heb' a chonhab'. Ojtac wal to malaj b'aj ix wactejkan walaneli.

Malaj b'aj max walel a tojolal. Ix walel yab'ixal to tz'elnhejk'och tas tzala', tzak'anpax colnab'il. Malaj b'aj ix in k'ub'ejel t'a yichanh heb' a chonhab' molaneq'ui, to te niwan a wach'k'olal, yelnhej pax tzala'.
Mamin Jehová, ayokab'nhej ok'elk'olal t'ayin. Ilinnhej yet' a wach'k'olal icha ix aj alani.

Yujto te ay tas sjawi t'a wib'anh, maxtzac b'ischajlaj wuuj. In yamchajelta yuj in chukal. Ichato maxtzac yal-laj wilani. Ek'b'al in chukal chi' t'a yichanh sb'isul xil in jolom. Vanxo somchajel in k'ool.
Mamin, cotanh wal k'elan t'ayin, cotanh, colineli. Cotanh elanhchamel, tzach och wed'oc.
Ha heb' snib'ej in smilanchamoc, jawokab' q'uixwelal yet' somk'olal t'a yib'anh heb'. B'atokab' heb' elelal t'a skal niwac q'uixwelal, yujto snib'ej heb' yak'an chukal t'ayin.
Ha heb' tzin b'uchani, kanokab' heb' t'a manh pensaril yuj somk'olal.
Axo masanil heb' ayoch spensar t'ayach, tzalajokab' heb' t'ayach. Te niwan elk'och ach Jehová, xchiokab' heb' snib'an a colwal.
Ha inxo jun, ob'iltac in, ay in och t'a ilk'olal. Mamin, mokab' in b'atkan satk'olal uuj. Ha ach tzach ochtaxon wed'oc yic tzin a colani. Ach Jehová in Diosal, manh ik'ek' tiempo in a colani.
